title: [Teras Isle, Lava Flows]
description: Flames and incandescent splatterings of lava leap above the treetops to the north.  All along the ridgeline, flashes of red and bright orange peek through the silhouetted foliage and lend an air of impending destruction to the scene.

Flames and incandescent splatterings of lava leap above the treetops to the north.  All along the ridgeline, flashes of red and dull orange peek through the greenery and lend an air of impending destruction to the scene.
